name: A Big Pink Dink
instructions: Pour rum over ice, fill with milk. Pour in a dash of grenadine to add a nice pink color.

name: A Few Of My Favorite Things
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: A Walk on the Moon
instructions: Mix everything into a tall glass. Serve with a straw.

name: Abbot's Dream
instructions: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a highball glass.

name: Absinthe Paralysis
instructions: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Pour over ice in a collins glass.

name: Absolut Zero
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass over ice cubes. Add sprig of mint for decoration.

name: Afrikaaner
instructions: Fill hurricane glass halfway with ice, add all ingredients and stir vigorously.

name: Alco Choco Milkshake
instructions: Combine all ingredients into a blender and blend for 30 seconds. Add a few cubes of ice to the blend if you prefer a frozen drink. Pour contents into a tall glass and enjoy.

name: Alex Chi-Chi
instructions: Shake in an ice filled shaker. Strain and serve.

name: Alexandra
instructions: Mix in a shaker, add some ice and shake very well.

name: All Killer with No Filler
instructions: Place beer, lager and Tequila into a cocktail shaker and shake for 10-15 seconds. Then pour into a pre-chilled beer glass. Then add the whipped cream on the top and volla!

name: Almond Amaretto Float
instructions: Pour the amaretto almond liqueur into a highball glass. Pour milk or cream into the glass until the glass is 2/3rds the way full. Top off the glass with Pepsi and serve.

name: Almond Cooler
instructions: Blend all except ice for 10-15 seconds. Add the ice cubes and blend for another 10 seconds to break up the ice cubes slightly. Serve in a Poco Grande or Hurricane glass garnished with a slice of orange and a Marichino cherry.

name: Almond Fog
instructions: Mix the Amaretto and Bailey's together in a cocktail shaker; strain into a coffee mug. Add milk to taste/to fill the mug, and serve.

name: Almond Joy #2
instructions: Fill mixing glass with ice, add Malibu, amaretto, creme de cacao, and cream. Shake, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Almond Soda
instructions: Shake everything twice with ice, pour into glasses with ice.

name: Amaretto Colada
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple slice or cherry, add straws, and serve in a pina colada glass.

name: Amaretto Cruise
instructions: Put everything into a blender with ice. Blend, adding ice until smooth. Serve in a tall glass.

name: American Leroy
instructions: Mix in a blender and pour into a highball glass.

name: Anal Sex
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a white wine glass half filled with ice.

name: Andrea's Colada Collision
instructions: Fill blender about 1/4 full with ice. Add all ingredients to blender. Blend to a smooth consistency. Serve in either a hurricane glass or a tall glass or goblet. Garnish with a pineapple spear is optional.

name: Andy's Ivory
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour into two hurricane glasses and serve chilled.

name: Ante Meridiem
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender and pour into glasses half filled with crushed ice.

name: Anti-Freeze #2
instructions: Pour the hot chocolate mix into a 9 ounce glass mug. Add the schnapps and boiling water. Stir Well. Top with a swirl of whipped cream. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry and a peppermint stick.

name: Apple Colada
instructions: Blend schnapps, cream of coconut, half-and-half, and 2 cups of crushed ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour contents into a collins glass. Decorate with an apple slice and a cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Aqua
instructions: Shake Vodka, Bailey's and Blue Curacao with ice. Pour into glass and fill up with 7-Up.

name: Arizona Twister
instructions:
Mix in the shots of rum, vodka, and tequila. 

Add splashes of the three juices, heavy on the pineapple. Top off with grenadine. Crushed ice should already be in glass. 

Top off the glass with a pineapple wedge.

name: Ashy Larry
instructions: Add pink lemonade to the Everclear. Then add the watermelon Smirnoff. Top with whipped cream and take it to the head.

name: Astroturf
instructions: Mix creme de menthe, creme de cacao and milk in glass. When ready to serve, squirt in chocolate syrup and mix until it turns a grass-like green/brown color.

name: Avalanche
instructions: Mix in highball glass over ice, shake well.

name: Avalanche #2
description: This Avalanche recipe creates a mix between a chocolate shake and a frappaccino.Combine all ingredients (except chocolate syrup) in a blender. Blend for 15 seconds. Add chocolate syrup and blend for an additional 20 seconds until smooth, or desired texture is reached. Pour into hurricane glasses, garnish as desired and serve.
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except chocolate syrup) in a blender. Blend for 15 seconds. Add chocolate syrup and blend for an additional 20 seconds until smooth, or desired texture is reached. Pour into hurricane glasses, garnish as desired and serve.

name: B's Creamy Gift
instructions: Fill pint glass with ice and proceed to build drink. Add the Frangelico, banana liqueur, vanilla vodka and Creme de cacao. Cap the glass and shake ingredients, then top off with cream and finish with a couple splashes of cream soda.

name: Baby Eskimo
instructions: Leave ice-cream out for about 10 minutes. Add ingredients in order, stir with chopstick (butter knife or spoon works too). Consume immediately and often. Nice and light, great for following a heavy drink.

name: Bacardi Big Skeet
instructions: Pour ingredients in order into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Bacardi Smoothie
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with ice, to make a smoothie-like consistancy. Pour into a pina-colada glass, garnish as desired and serve.

name: Bahama Blue
instructions: Measure a collins glass full of ice cubes into a cocktail shaker. Add ingredients, shake well, and pour back into collins glass.

name: Bahama Mama #3
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend well, pour into a tall glass, and serve.

name: Bahia
instructions: Pour pineapple juice, coconut cream and white rum into a shaker. Add a barspoon of cream. Shake well and strain into a large highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and amarelle cherry, and serve.

name: Bahia Cooler
instructions: Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

name: Bailey's Banana Colada
instructions: Put the banana and banana liqueur into a blender until it becomes a thick paste. Add bailey's to taste; pina colada mix and rum to taste as well. Blend well, add ice, and blend again until smooth. Serve in a pina-colada glass.

name: Bailey's Banana Vanilla Thrilla
instructions: Add all liquids in blender with banana and ice cream; blending until smooth. Add ice and sugar, and pulse until a smoothie consistency is reached. Garnish with coconut. Makes 2-3 500ml servings. For a fancier garnish, use the head of a tropical flower.

name: Bailey's Float
instructions: Pour Bailey's 3/4 of the way into a glass, then carefully fill the rest of the way with root beer.

name: Bailey's Meets Cadburys
instructions: Add Bailey's to Cadbury's Hot Chocolate. Top with whipped cream.

name: Ball Bag
description: The Ball Bag was contributed by Alan Ring, Cambridge, England. Popular with any one who can afford it, very unpopular with those who can't......Stir ingredients together with ice in a highball glass, and serve.
instructions: Stir ingredients together with ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Banana Banshee
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Banana Berry
instructions: Pour creme de banane over ice in a highball glass. Fill to the top with milk and add grenadine.

name: Banana Bracer
instructions: Blend everything except the cherry in a blender. Serve in a collins glass with the cherry as garnish.

name: Banana Colada
instructions: Blend 4 first ingredients with 1/2 cut cracked ice at high speed in 15-25 seconds. Pour into a chilled highball glass. Garnish with cherry and pineapple slice.

name: Banana Creame
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Banana Dream
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a glass and stir well. Much better if mixed with a blender, but a stir stick will do.

name: Banana Jacuzzi Shake
instructions: Add ice cubes and milk to a blender. Stir until ice cubes melt. Chop if there is a chopping setting. Blend for 20 seconds. Add ice cream. Blend for 30 seconds. Add rum and coconut extract, blend for 45 seconds. Serve in chilled glasses.

name: Banana Rama
instructions: Blend everything in electric mixer, pour into glasses and garnish with banana and strawberries.

name: Banana Rocket
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend for 1 minute until thick and smooth consistency. Pour into a champagne flute, garnish with a strawberry and a straw, and serve.

name: Banana Split #4
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a parfait glass over ice, and serve.

name: Bananalyzer
instructions: Pour the liquors, ice and coca-cola into a collins glass to make it 3/4 full. Fill to the top with milk.

name: Bananas Foster
instructions: Slice banana and put all slices except one into blender. Add cream, ice cream, banana liqueur, banana rum, butterscotch schnapps and 3/4 oz. dark rum. Blend to a creamy texture and pour into a wide-mouthed glass. Float 1/2 oz. of dark rum on top and add final slice of banana to rim for garnish Light the rum on fire for effect while serving. Blow flame out and enjoy.

name: Bangkok Bomb
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with ice and blend until frothy. Serve in a highball glass.

name: Bartender's Rootbeer
instructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker, shake until foamy, pour into mug. Should come out foamy, like rootbeer!

name: Batida de Banana
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Batida de Brazil
instructions: Pour over crushed ice in a large highball glass. Stir, and serve.

name: BaWanna Tom
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender with crushed ice until smooth. Garnish with shaved white and milk chocolate and serve with a large straw or spoon.

name: Baywatch
instructions: Shake the vodka, the galliano and the juice in a shaker. Then add ice and finally put cream on top. A little bit of chocolate makes it look really great. Should be served in a hurricane glass with a straw.

name: Belize Rum Punch
instructions: Fill tall glass with ice, add first 5 ingredients then top off with pineapple juice. Shake thoroughly. Add a dash or two of grenadine, stir gently and then listen to the sound of the warm Carribean breezes flowing through the palm trees.

name: Bellevue
instructions: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Berrynice
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a strawberry on the glass, and with another summer berry held on with a toothpick.

name: Bit of Russian Honey
instructions: Add ingredients (cream as desired), shake and pour over ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Black Cherry
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled highball glass. Shake, top with a cherry, and serve.

name: Black Forest
instructions: Shake ingredients together and pour into glass. Add a little more cream as a floater, then add a cherry.

name: Blastula
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a champagne flute.

name: Blind Russian
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add all liqueurs. Add milk. shake.

name: Blue Colada
instructions: Blend ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour into a collins glass and garnish with a slice of pineapple or a plastic monkey.

name: Blue Hawaiian
instructions: Blend light rum, blue curacao, pineapple juice, and cream of coconut with one cup ice in an electric blender at high speed. Pour contents into a highball glass. Decorate with the slice of pineapple and a cherry.

name: Blue Knickers
instructions: Shake the Vodka, Blue Curacao, Galliano and pineapple juice in a shaker. Pour into glass and add a layer of cream to the top. Serve with a straw and an orange wedge. Drink is to be sipped through the straw.

name: Blue Russian
instructions: Place 2 - 3 crushed ice cubes in a parfait glass. Pour the blue curacao over the ice, and add the vodka. Top with cream, and serve.

name: Blueberry Popsicle
instructions: Blend milk and schnapps in a blender with ice. Add blue curacao as needed to reach desired color. Serve in a collins glass.

name: Bogomip
instructions: Pour sake and coconut milk into the glass. Fill with pink lemonade. Fill the glass with ice first if desired.

name: Bonaparte Velvet
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice, and serve with straws.

name: Born on the 4th of July
instructions: Pour blue curacao into an ice-filled collins glass. Carefully layer both the sloe gin and cream on top of the ice. (The result should be a blue and red drink with tendrils of white shooting through the colors.)

name: Bosco 42DD
instructions: Put 1 scoop chocolate ice cream into glass. Add Kahlua, then gin, then creme de cacoa, then brandy, and finally put a 2nd scoop of choclate ice cream on top.

name: Bottom of the Barrel
instructions: Put the whip cream in first, then the rum, then the root beer. Stir.

name: Bourbon Float
instructions: Chill a beer mug. Add two scoops of vanilla ice cream, then bourbon. Fill with coke.

name: Bourbon Milk Punch #2
instructions: In a highball glass, dissolve the sugar in the bourbon by stirring with a teaspoon. Add 6 ice cubes and the milk. Stir well. Garnish with the cinnamon.

name: Bourbon Milk Punch #3
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, creme de cacao, and milk. Shake well. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Brandon and Will's Coke Float
instructions: Scoop two large scoops of vanilla ice-cream into frosted beer mug. Next, add 2 ounces Maker's Mark. Then, pour in coke. Gently stir and enjoy.

name: Brandy Eggnog
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over ice cubes, sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Brandy Milk Punch
instructions: Shake brandy, milk, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Brandy Plush
instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled wine glass. Dust with freshly grated nutmeg, and serve.

name: Brandy Puff
instructions: Shake the brandy and milk in a shaker, strain into a wine goblet, and add the soda.

name: Brown Cow From Hell
instructions: Mix all ingredients until no chocolate residue is left on bottom of glass. Serve chilled.

name: Brown Elephant #2
instructions: Add 3 ice cubes to a 10 ounce glass. Add Amarula and Kahlua liqueurs. Top up with milk, stir and serve.

name: Bull Stuff
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Sprinkle cinnamon and nutmeg on top.

name: Bull's Milk
instructions: Shake rum, brandy, milk, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg and the pinch of cinnamon on top and serve.

name: Burberry Bulldog
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice cubes. Pour in the vodka, Chambord raspberry liqueur, Kahlua coffee liqueur and Irish cream. Stir, then fill up the glass with equal portions of milk and Dr. Pepper soda. Stir again and serve.

name: Bushwacker #2
instructions:
Fill blender 3/4 with ice (small cubes best).

Add a small splash of vodka, a small splash of Grand Marnier. Add a healthy serving of kahlua and a little less healthy splash of amaretto. Fill the blender with Bailey's until liquid is 1/2 inch from top of ice cubes. Mix until smooth. 

Pour in hurricane glass and sprinkle some nutmeg on top!

name: Bushwacker #3
instructions: Put all contents in a blender with ice and blend until smooth. Ice-cream can be substituted for the half-and-half.

name: Butter Baby
instructions: Combine ingredients in a beer mug. Stir and serve.

name: Butter Cookie
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Butter Milk
instructions: Add ingredients to a mug with a couple of ice cubes.

name: Buttercream Tea
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker and shake. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Butterfinger
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Butterscotch Schnapps and Bailey's into the glass. Fill with Milk. Shake. Serve with sip straw.

name: Butterscotch Dream
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake and pour into a pina colada glass. Garnish with whipped cream and caramel.

name: Butterscotch Milk Punch
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Butterscotch Mudslide Shake
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with 2 cups of ice cubes. Blend until thick like a shake, and pour into a collins glass. Add or subtract ice to liking for thickness. This is also good unblended on the rocks. Makes two drinks.

name: Cabana Club
instructions: Blend with crushed ice.

name: Cafe Mazatlan
instructions: Put the sugar in glass, add rum and Kahlua, warm gently. Add coffee and stir well. Put a dash of whipped cream on top. Enjoy!

name: Caffeine Attack
instructions: Fill blender with coffee ice-cream and the amount of kahula to your desire. Blend until drinkable, pour into a beer mug and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Calm Monkey
instructions: Pour the vodka and Kahlua coffee liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the Bailey's Irish cream, fill the glass with milk, stir and serve.

name: Calypso Daiquiri
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender with ice until smooth. Serve in a coupette glass.

name: Cancun Cocktail
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir.

name: Candy Bar
instructions: Blend kahlua, creme de cacao, and frangelico. Add cream. Serve with ice cubes in highball glass.

name: Captain's and Cream
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Car Bomb
instructions: Combine Irish cream and whiskey in a shot glass. Drop shot into a glass of Guinness and drink quickly.

name: Caramel Nut Ice Cream
instructions: Blend caramel liqueur, creme de cacao, vodka and ice cream in a bar blender at low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and top with whipped cream and chopped nuts.

name: Caribbean Bulldog
instructions: Build the kahlua, caribbean cream and milk (or half-and-half) over ice in a tall highball glass. Add coca-cola and stir gently. Add straws, and serve.

name: Caribbean Milk
instructions: Shake the milk with the Vanilla, add to the shaker the other ingredients and shake well.

name: Caribbean Screwdriver
instructions: Obviously this is not a drink for a small glass. Mix and shake ingredients in a shaker glass with ice. Strain the mixture into a tall glass. Garnish with a cherry if you feel so inclined.

name: Caribbean Storm
instructions:
Put ice cubes and Curacao Blue in to Highball glass. Put rum, coconut milk and juices to shaker and shake everything together. Pour the mixture to the glass and garnish with pineaple or other exotic fruits. Add cherry for more colour contrast.

Other variant is just to put everything in to the blender with crushed ice and blend until smooth...your choice!

name: Carribean Catholic
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes and shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. If possible, shake chocolate powder (Cadbury's) over a match/lighter on top, and serve.

name: Carrie's Pink Blossom
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Mix tequila rose, amaretto and milk. Can also add a splash of soda to make fizzy.

name: Carrot Cake
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Place a tsp. (float) of Goldschlager in glass. Fill rest of glass with Irish Cream and Coffee Liqueur. Shake. Pour into shot glasses.

name: Carry's Caribe
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender at high speed until smooth. Serve in a collins glass.

name: Casablanca
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a collins glass. Add grenadine, garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve unstirred.

name: Castillian Hot Chocolate
instructions:
Shift the cocoa and sugar together into a medium-sized saucepan. Dissolve the cornstarch in the water, and stir into the cocoa and sugar until it is a smooth paste. 

Begin heating the mixture, stirring it with a whisk, and gradually pour in the milk. Continue stirring with the whisk as you bring the liquid to a simmer. 

Allow the chocolate to simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring often, until it is thick, glossy and completely smooth. 

Serve steaming hot in coffee mug. Serves six.

name: Cattie Suprise
instructions:
Combine the first 3 ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake until frothy.

Decorate a tall glass internally with swirls of Hershey's Chocolate Syrup and strain the shaker mixture into glass without ice. 

Top with whipped cream and garnish with maraschino cherry. Serve with a straw.

name: Charles's Caribbean
instructions: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker, and strain into a collins glass over ice. Garnish with pineapple chunks and a stemmed cherry, and serve.

name: Charlie's Angel #2
instructions: Pour the white creme de menthe into a highball glass and fill with the double cream to an inch from the top. Stir well. Next carefully float the spiced rum on the top. Drink from the bottom with a straw.

name: Checkerboard
instructions: Blend in a bar blender at low speed. Serve in a champagne flute topped with chocolate shavings.

name: Cherry Chocolate Milk Royal
description: Cherry Chocolate Milk Royal was contributed and created by Aaron Turpin on Christmas Eve several years ago, from a limited ingredient list. It tastes just like regular chocolate milk only better.In a large, milkshake-shape glass (16-oz+), pour the vodka, cherry juice, 3 cherries, chocolate syrup and cold milk. Stir the mixture carefully with a chopstick being careful not to spill until the syrup has dissolved. Add a flexible straw. Top with whipped cream from a can. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles and one of the cherries, and serve immediately.
instructions: In a large, milkshake-shape glass (16-oz+), pour the vodka, cherry juice, 3 cherries, chocolate syrup and cold milk. Stir the mixture carefully with a chopstick being careful not to spill until the syrup has dissolved. Add a flexible straw. Top with whipped cream from a can. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles and one of the cherries, and serve immediately.

name: Cherry Poppin' Scotty
instructions: Pour single-malt scotch in collins glass over ice. Add Milk or cream until nearly filled, then pour Creme de Cacao slowly, layering on the top. Top with 2 maraschino cherries.

name: China Girl
instructions: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into an exotic glass.

name: Choco Colada
instructions: Shake liquids well over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, sprinkle with grated chocolate, and serve.

name: Chocolate Almond Kiss
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender with ice. Serve in a coupette glass and garnish with chocolate shavings.

name: Chocolate Buzz
instructions: Pour chocolate milk into a large glass. Add 2 shots of kahlua and 2 shots of irish cream. Serve cold.

name: Chocolate Chicken
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add all ingredients and fill the rest of the glass with cream!

name: Chocolate Confusion
instructions: Add into a shaker: one half ounce of each of the liqueurs, milk and chocolate syrup. Shake and serve.

name: Chocolate Heart
instructions: Add a few ice cubes to a highball glass. Pour in Frangelico and Kahlua, then drop in a maraschino cherry (remove the stem). Pour the cream down the sides of the glass and stir lightly before serving.

name: Chocolate Leprechaun
instructions: Combine ingredients in a collins glass and stir well.

name: Chocolate Milk with a Kick
instructions: Chill all ingredients and pour in glass.

name: Chocolate Paradise
instructions: Simply pour over ice into a tall glass.

name: Chocolate Raspberry Cream
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender until smooth. Serve in a champagne flute.

name: Chocolate Russian
instructions: Pour the Van Gogh chocolate vodka and Kahlua coffee liqueur over ice in a highball glass. Top with cream, to taste, and serve.

ingredients.name: Vincent Van Gogh® Dutch chocolate vodka

name: Chocolate Shake
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender with ice. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Chocolate Snowball
instructions: Place the chocolate syrup around the glass then place the other ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake. Strain into glass.

name: Chocolate Toasted Almond
instructions: Mix all together. Serve in a collins glass over ice.

name: ChoozyMothers Milk
instructions: In a large kettle (lobster pot), mix the Bacardi 151 Dark Rum, Bacardi White Rum, Kahlua, Milk and Vanilla Ice Cream (keep the ice cream in its form from the carton). Stir and mix in the cinnamon powder.

name: Cinnamon Cream
instructions: Stir.

name: Cocaine Lady #2
instructions: Shake and strain over ice in a highball glass. Float coke on top, and serve.

name: Coco Blossom
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. You can also add ice or a splash of soda to make fizzy.

name: Coco Butter
instructions: Combine ingredfients in a highball glass with ice.

name: Coco Tropico Smoothie
instructions: Blend ingredients in a blender until smooth and creamy. Use chilled glasses and pour over ice for afteroon drinks in the sun. Serves many!

name: Cocoa Colada
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender until smooth. Serve in a collins glass and garnish with a cherry and a sprinkle of chocolate shavings.

name: Coconut Daiquiri
instructions: Rim glass with lime and grated coconut. Shake all ingredients (except dark rum) and strain into a wine goblet filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lime, and sprinkle dark rum on top using a barspoon. Serve with short straws.

name: Coconut Frappe
instructions: Shake or blend until frothy, then pour over ice and garnish with toasted coconut.

name: Coffee Colada
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry. Add straws, and serve.

name: Coffee Cream
instructions: Shake and strain into a wine goblet filled with broken ice. Sprinkle with grated coconut, and serve with short straws.

name: Colada Brazil
instructions: Blend ingredients together with crushed ice in a shaker or blender. Pour into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Colada Collision
instructions: Blend ingredients in a blender with ice until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Colorado Avalanche
instructions: Pour the brandy and the schnapps over the ice cream. Easy and quick.

name: Colorado Pitbull
instructions: In a shaker mix Spiced Rum, Kahlua, and Cream. Pur into a mason jar filled with ice and add a splash of Coca-Cola. Garnish with a couple of Filberts.

name: Cookies 'n' Cream
instructions: Add the creme de cacao and vanilla schnapps and then fill with milk.

name: Copacabana
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass. Fill with crushed ice, and serve.

name: Cordial Cherry
instructions: Pour amaretto and Coquila liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice. Shake until chilled. Pour into a wine glass and add Tequila Rose cream liqueur. Sprinkle dark chocolate shavings on top for garnish/ flavor.

name: Cossak
instructions: Add liqueur after filling glass with preferred amount of milk. Vodka can be excluded for a milder drink.

name: Cream Bomb
instructions: Shake the Malibu coconut rum, white rum, melon liqueur, orange juice and cream in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the syrup last, and serve.

name: Cream Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Cream Seven Simulator
instructions: Pour tequila and Triple Sec over ice. Squeeze lime wedge into drink and fill with cream soda. Stir. Tastes vaguely like a Seven & Seven, only with tequila.

name: Cream Soda Shaker
instructions: To make this easy drinking beverage, you must mix together the Cream Soda and Vodka in a blender with ice. Then put the Shake in a Highball glass with the Lime as a garnish.

name: Creamin' Beemin'
instructions: Pour whiskey into tumbler over ice and add cream soda on top.

name: Creamjager
instructions: Pour one shot of JíƒÂ¤germeister and fill the glass with cream soda.

name: Creamsicle
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

name: Creamsicle #8
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into a hurricane glass with an orange and cherry garnish, and serve.

name: Creamsicle Dream
instructions: Put all ingredients in glass and stir. Served as a float drink. Can also be mixed in a blender and served as a shake.

name: Creamy Niall
instructions: Fill bottom of glass with ice and pour vodka over it. Follow this by filling the glass full with cream soda.

name: Creamy Pina Colada
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender, except for ice. Serve over ice.

name: Creamy Punani
instructions: Fill a blender about 3/4 full with vanilla ice-cream (not solid). Add the amaretto and kahlua, followed by the bailey's irish cream. Blend until smooth, and pour into tall glasses.

name: Creamy Root Beer Float
instructions: Fill a frosted beer mug with ice. Pour 1 1/2 to 2 ounces of Dr. Vanillacuddy's over ice, fill glass with root beer about 3/4 of an inch from the top. Top off with cream to taste.

name: Creamy Sam
instructions: Mix equal parts sambuca and cream soda with ice. Serve in a chilled glass.

name: Creative Native
instructions: Add all liquid ingredients in blender and set on frappe till the drink is the consistancy of a smoothie. You can serve this in a frosty hurricane glass and top off with whipped cream as desired.

name: Crucifix of Love
instructions: Pour Red Bull into glass over ice. Then add Jack, then the shot of Bailey's. Drink quickly.

name: Cum Guzzler
instructions: In a blender mix ice cream, chocolate syrup, instant coffee, milk and cookies. Blend together. Add gin and blend again. Pour into mug and top with whipped cream.

name: Cum In A Hot Tub
instructions: Pour the vodka and rum carefully but not too carefully into a glass. They have different consistencies and you want them to mix just a little. Now let several drops of Bailey's fall into the liquor.

name: Dambuster
instructions: In a highball glass with ice, pour three shots of Rum (preferably Bacardi) one shot of Kahlua, a shot of ginger ale and fill the rest of the glass with milk, (Homo or 2%, never SKIM!) Stir. That's It! Enjoy

name: Dark Indulgence
instructions: Blend all ingredients. Pour into poco grande glass.

name: Dark Pike
instructions: Pour vodka into the milk. Add chocolate flavoring as desired, and serve.

name: Deep Pleasure
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice, then add the Kahlua coffee liqueur, Bailey's Irish cream and butterscotch schnapps. Add half-and-half as desired. For less cream, put in an old fashioned glass.

name: Delicias de la Habana
instructions: Mix blue curacao with rum and ice. Pour it into a glass and add the rest of the ingredients slowly. Garnish with a piece of peach, a cherry and a piece of celery.

name: Della's After Dark
instructions: Place ice in blender, add remaining items, and mix well into a slushi. Pour into a large glass of 16 oz or more, hurricane glass is recommended. Top drinks with whipped topping and a whole cherry, and drizzle coco syrup over whipped topping. Add a large straw into glass, preferably a large plastic flex straw. Maybe strong tasting due to Kamora, so you can dilute mix with vodka if desired.

name: Diaper Stripes
instructions: Drink the Yoohoo down to the top of the label, fill with rum and shake. Chocolate will seperate out leaving a diaper stain appearance.

name: Dickhead's Delight
instructions: Mix liquor and chocolate milk in a highball glass, then top with whipped cream and cinnamon.

name: Dirty Grasshopper
instructions: Pour creme de menthe and kahlua in a glass over ice. Add milk to fill. Garnish with whatever you'd like, and serve.

name: Dirty Momma
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.

name: Dirty Shaft
instructions: Shake root beer and sambuca vigorously in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Splash Irish cream on top.

name: Dis'alotta
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass.

name: Dixie Pearl
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes, and shake well. Pour over ice in a tall glass, and serve.

name: Dixie Smooth
instructions: Measure a collins glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker. Add ingredients and shake well. Pour mixture into collins glass.

name: Dog Biscuit
instructions: Pour all ingredients on the rocks. Stir.

name: Drambuie Coffee
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a coffee mug, top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Dreamsicle #3
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add schnapps, then orange juice and at last milk. Stir vigorously until mixed.

name: Drift
instructions: Slowly pour Bailey's around the top of the test tube, then add the rum. Float the absinthe on top. Light the absinthe and let it burn for about 5 seconds. Blow it out and enjoy.

name: Dutchie
instructions:
Pour creme de banane, apricot brandy and cherry brandy into the beer mug. Drop in a few ice cubes, and fill mug 3/4 with milk. Slowly pour the ounce of advocaat over the top of the milk covering the surface. 

Now watch as the advocaat drips around the ice and through the milk. This affect is best when the advocaat has been chilled.

name: Ebony Babe
instructions: Crush oreos and chocolate...add to Chocolate Milk, chocolate syrup and kahlua...stir in cinnamon with cinnamon sticks.

name: Ed-Mans Blues
instructions: Blend and shake all ingredients except soda water and cinnamon. Pour into a tall glass filled with ice cubes. Add soda water and top off with 2 dashes of cinnamon. Stir and lose your blues...

name: Egg Cream
instructions: Mix syrup and milk in a tall glass. Add soda water, and serve with a straw.

name: Elephant Shake
instructions: Blend on high until smooth. Pour into a tall glass.

name: Emerald Isle Cooler
instructions: Put ice cream into a collins glass. Add the creme de menthe and Irish whiskey, stirring well. Fill with carbonated water and stir one last time before serving.

name: Enchantress
instructions: Combine alcoholic ingredients in glass over ice. Fill to top with milk, add splash of grenadine. Stir gently.

name: Eskay Slammer
instructions: Pour the Maker's Mark bourbon whiskey into a highball glass. Add the ice cold root beer, a small scoop of vanilla ice cream, and serve.

name: Etyk
instructions: Shake and serve with ice!

name: Event Horizon
instructions: Blend ingredients at high speed and serve immediately.

name: Fag Juice
instructions: Put the coconut milk in the glass first and then pour the liquors over it. Add 7-up and ice (equal parts) to top off, and serve.

name: Fat Bastard
instructions: Combine in glass over ice (first vodka, then godiva, then milk). Stir thoroughly, and serve.

name: Fifth Avenue
instructions: Pour ingredients into a parfait glass (in order given) so that each ingredient floats on preceding one. Serve without mixing.

name: Flamingo Fuzz
instructions: Add rums to glass. Add a puff of whipped cream on top; drizzle cherry juice over whipped cream and top with a cherry.

name: Flamingo Squeezer
instructions:
Squeeze the juice of the orange into an empty cocktail shaker, then add rum, cream of coconut and grenadine and shake. Fill pint glass with ice and pour the shaker contents over the ice. Place a tiny plastic pink flamingo on the rim and serve with a straw.

For flair, combine all the ingredients except the Grenadine and pour over the ice. Put the drops of grenadine on top, then right before serving, stir it front of your guest.

name: Flying Gorilla
instructions: Pour all ingredients into glass over ice.

name: Flying Kangaroo
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass with crushed ice. Add pineapple chunks, and serve.

name: Frangelico Float
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve in a highball glass and garnish with whipped cream.

name: Free Silver
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: French Colada
instructions: Shake over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Add pineapple chunks, and serve.

name: French Mud Slide
instructions: Add all ingredients to a Collin's glass with ice.

name: Fridays Frozen Mudslide
instructions: Begin by crushing the 8 ice cubes in a blender. When ice is finely crushed, add the remaining ingredients and blend for 45 seconds on blender's highest setting. Pour into glass and serve immediately.

name: Frozen Girl Scout
instructions: Blend. Add more or less milk to get a shake consistancy.

name: Frozen Grasshopper
instructions: Mix all three ingredients together in a blender and blend until drink has the consistency of a good milk shake. Serve with a spoon and straw.

name: Frozen Kahlua Mudslide
instructions: Blend everything and pour. Top with cherry.

name: Frozen Mudslide
instructions: Blend alcohol with ice-cream. Serve in a frosted glass.

name: Frozen Nipples
instructions: Blend ingredients until smooth.

name: Frozen Orange Dream
instructions: In blender place about 8 ice cubes, 2 oz. Grand Marnier,and about 1/4 cup vanilla ice cream. Blend until smooth. Add a drop or two of orange food coloring for stronger color. Pour into a Hurricane glass and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Fruit Loop
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Pour curacao over ice then fill with milk.

name: Fucked Up Float
instructions: Mix together kahlua, schnapps, vodka, ice-cream and cola until blended. Fill with milk.

name: Funky Monkey
instructions: Blend with ice until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with coconut flakes.

name: Fuzzy Ethan
instructions: Mix all ingredients except lime in a cocktail shaker, then shake, and pour into glass. Add lime.

name: G.I. Giraffe
instructions: Mix all the alcohol together using a whisk then add the banana chunks and chocolate chips to the alcohol. Then put the lemon on the side of the glass.

name: Galapagos
instructions: Combine bitters, pineapple juice, pina colada mix, melon liqueur, lemon vodka and strega in a tall glass. Add whipped cream and serve with pineapple chunks, dessicated coconut and cherries on top.

name: Ghost
instructions: Fill a 16 oz. glass with ice add 1 shot Jack Daniel's, 2 shots Vanilla Rum and top with Cream soda.

name: Ghostbuster
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Gin Milk Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Gingerbread Man #2
instructions: Mix the ingredients with ice in a shaker and pour into a highball glass.

name: Gingersnap
instructions: Shake kahlua, bailey's irish cream, frangelico, and jagermeister in an ice-filled shaker, and strain contents into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with cola.

name: Godiva Chocolate Covered Banana
instructions: Blend in a bar blender until smooth. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with some of the remaining banana.

name: Godiva Mudslide
instructions: Drink can be served over rocks or frozen. Swirl some chocolate syrup on the side of the glass for presentation.

name: Golden Colada
instructions: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple chunk and a stemmed cherry, and serve.

name: Golden Star
instructions: Place two scoops of ice-cream in a blender, add liquor, and blend until milkshake-consistancy.

name: Gorilla Milk
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the vodka and dark creme de cacao. Fill with milk, shake and serve.

name: Gorilla Milk #2
instructions: Stir or shake. Ice cream can be used instead of milk and blended in a blender.

name: Grand Royal Fizz
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with club soda and stir.

name: Grape Bubbolicious
instructions:
Pour the Skyy Vodka, Chamborde, Grape Pucker and Soda with a splash of cream into a shaker full of ice. 

Shake vigorously and strain into sugar rimmed collins glass.

name: Green Coconut
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour over ice in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Green Doodoo
instructions: Pour ingredients into ice filled shaker, shake and strain into glass.

name: Green Milkshake
instructions: Pour grenadine onto the edge of the glass and then sugar to create a red edge on the glass. Then pour all three ingredients into a shaker with crushed ice and shake well. Finally, pour the contents of the shaker into a highball glass.

name: Grendel
instructions: Shake ingredients (minus lemonade) with ice and pour into a pint glass. Top with lemonade.

name: Grovspol
instructions: Start by pouring the whiskey, then bailey's, then cointreau. Add a splash of pepsi on top of it.

name: Gump Cocktail
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice and sprinkle fresh-ground nutmeg on top.

name: Hangover Cure
instructions: Pour raspberry juice into beer mug, then add tequlia, rum, and amaretto slowly. Add coconut milk and sprinkle with your favourite spices.

name: Happy Holly-daze
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Hawaiian Eye
instructions: Combine ingredients with a bit of cracked ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled tumbler and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

name: Headcrack
instructions: Stir well with ice and a spoon.

name: Hillbilly Bob's Mountain Drink
instructions: Shake all ingredients except coke. Pour over ice and top with coke for an extra creamy head. Serve with a straw on a sunny day.

name: Hot Butterscotch Cocoa
instructions: Mix ingredients in coffee mug, and top with whipped cream.

name: Hot Young Lady
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker, no ice. Shake well and pour into collins glasses.

name: Hufflepuff
instructions: Mix liquor with ice and strain directly into the cream. Mix. Serve in a hurricane glass.

name: Hula Shake
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve in a frosted collins glass, garnished with a pineapple wheel and maraschino cherry.

name: Hummingbird
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth.

name: Hummingbird #2
instructions: Blend ingredients in a blender with crushed ice. Strain into a hurricane glass, and serve.

name: Ice Cream Float
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add vanilla schnapps, fill glass with favorite soda (anything you would put on ice cream...root beer, dr. pepper, orange) leaving 1/2 inch headspace. Fill with cream.. not milk. Serve.

name: Ice Cream Schnapps
instructions: Scoop ice cream into glass, pour butterscotch schnapps and coke over top ice cream.

name: Ice Storm
instructions: Take all the ingredients and place them in a blender. Pour into two 16 oz. glasses and relax.

name: Iceberg
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a blender, blend, and pour into a frozen highball glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick or chocolate shavings.

name: Insane Asylum
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir.

name: Irish C-4
instructions: Pour Jim Beam and Jameson into a beer mug, than fill with one can of guinness stout. Float bailey's and irish mist on top, stir and serve.

name: Irish Chocolate Milk
instructions: Put a few ice cubes into a highball glass. Add shot of Bailey's and the half-shot of Creme de Cacao. Stir together before adding the milk, then add the rest.

name: Irish Coconut
instructions: Shake all ingredients well with ice. Strain into an iced highball glass, top with soda, stir, and serve.

name: Irish Cream #2
instructions: Put everything into a blender and mix. Makes about three small mason jars.

name: Irish Cream BTB
instructions:
Mix all the ingredients thoroughly, except for the whipping cream. You can use a mixer (recommended) or by hand. After all the ingredients are mixed well you will add the whipping cream, mix lightly, do not overmix.

BTB = Better Than Bailey's

name: Irish Cream Liqueur
instructions: Mix scotch and milk. Add half-and-half. Add syrups, and serve in wine glasses.

name: Irish Hot Chocolate
instructions: Pour Bailey's Irish Cream into a coffee mug then fill with prepared Nestle Hot Chocolate. Top with whipped cream or marshmellows and a cherry.

name: Irish Immigrant
instructions: Pour Irish Cream on top of Vanilla Coke. Top with two scoops of Vanilla.

name: Irish Mint
instructions: Pour the milk first and then the irish cream - the parts are only guesses, I tend to go by color. You want a creamy beige that has only a slight hint of alcohol. Add just enough creme de menthe so as to turn the drink slightly green. Stir it up and serve cold.

name: Irish Mudslide
instructions: Use a chilled beer mug. Add Irish cream and fill with root beer.

name: Irish Orgasm
instructions: Mix ingredients and pour over ice.

name: Irish Pinata
instructions: Fill glass with ice and add milk. Add St. Brendan's Irish Cream, vodka, Bailey's Mint Chocolate, then Kahlua. Stir gently.

name: Irish Tea
instructions: Make a cup of tea. Add sugar or sweetener if wanted. Add Bailey's Irish Cream to your liking.

name: Irish Vanilla Coffee
instructions: Pour into a coffee mug 4 oz. of coffee. Add 1 1/2 oz. each of Bailey's Irish Cream and Absolut Vanilla Vodka. Stir lightly and top, if desired, whipped cream.

name: Iron Hindu
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cardamom) with plenty of ice and pour into a hurricane glass. Grind a moderate amount of green cardomom on top. (This is extremely important, and gives the drink it's characteristic purfume.) Garnish with fruit, and serve.

name: Island Affair
instructions: Shake melon liqueur, cointreau and juices and strain into a pina colada glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Add curacao, and float cream on top. Garnish with fruit, and serve with straws.

name: Italian Colada
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Garnish with an amarelle cherry, and serve.

name: Jake White Special
instructions: Pour the rum into a collins glass 1/3 filled with ice. Fill glass with cream soda. Stir gently, and serve.

name: Jason Voorhies
instructions: Layer whipped cream first, then the vodka, then the root beer. When done layering, try and center the club soda into the root beer without upsetting the liquors.

name: Javahopper
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice.

name: Jay's Rootbeer Dream
instructions: Add all ingredients except the cola into a flash cup. Flash for 10 sec. or till foamy. Serve in a beer mug, preferably chilled, half-filled with ice. Add a splash of cola on top.

name: Jen's Hot Chocolate Butterscotch
instructions: Add one shot of butterscotch schnapps to the hot chocolate. Top off with bailey's.

name: Jeremiah
instructions: Mix all ingredients except milk in a mixing glass. Add ice, then fill the glass with milk. Shake vigorously, pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Jewish Bulldozer
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, stir briefly and serve.

name: Jones
instructions: Stir together in a collins glass, and serve.

name: Juiffee
instructions: Mix ingredients in a a highball glass.

name: Jungle Jizz
instructions: Throw it all in a blender or food processor and hit frappe!

name: Kahlua Cookie
instructions: Combine all in a blender. Blend extremely well, pour into a large glass (ie. hurricane) and serve.

name: Kahlua Cream Soda
instructions: Shake kahlua and cream, and strain into a highball glass. Add soda, and serve with a straw.

name: Kahlua Frost
instructions: Blend everything until smooth. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Kahlua Mudslide
instructions: Shake everything with ice. Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Kahlua Peppermint Pattie
instructions: Pour Kahlua and peppermint schnapps into glass over ice, add cream, and top off with club soda. Stir with a straw.

name: Kahlua Twist
instructions: Pour tequila and kahlua into a hurricane glass. Fill the rest with chocolate milk. Stir well.

name: Kamora Rich Rewards
instructions: Blend ingredients together until smooth and serve with cookies.

name: Kamora Vanilla Shake
instructions: Blend everything until smooth. Serve with vanilla wafer cookies.

name: Kappa Colada
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into a collins glass with ice.

name: Karlsson
instructions: Shake well and pour into a glass. Substitute banana liqueur for pisang ambon if needed.

name: Karlsson's Dream
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker, shake well, and strain into a highball glass.

name: Key West Song
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender with a scoop of crushed ice, and pour into a highball glass.

name: Kick In The Glass
instructions: Pour the Bacardi O in a large glass, add a splash of cranberry juice, then fill with orange juice. To top it off, add a generous scoop of vanilla ice cream. Let the ice cream melt a little bit and enjoy.

name: Kickstand
instructions: Pour amaretto and southern comfort into a highball glass, and layer kahlua and irish cream.

name: Kill Me Now Kahlua
instructions: Mix all ingrediants except for cherry, in a blender. Pour in highball glass and add the cherry for garnish.

name: Kim Special
instructions: Build over ice in a tall glass and serve.

name: King Kong
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender, and combine on medium power for 45 seconds. Serve in a pitcher with a cute umbrella and a straw.

name: King Peach
instructions: Put ice, ginger ale, ice cream and peaches into blender and blend for 30 seconds. Add peach schnapps and blend again. Serve immediately garnished with peach slices.

name: Kinky Orgasm
instructions: Pour bailey's, amaretto and kahlua into a highball glass. Fill with milk, add strawberries or vanilla ice-cream if desired, and serve.

name: Kitty Nectar
instructions: Pour liqueurs in a shaker 2/3 full of crushed ice. Strain and top with 7-up.

name: Kiwi Colada
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth. Serve in pina colada glasses.

name: Kodiak Sled Dog
instructions: Blend everything to a milkshake consistency. Makes one serving.

name: KOJ
instructions: Add ingredients to glass and mix lightly.

name: Kuni's Helper
instructions: Blend ice cream, strawberry liqueur and milk in a bar blender until homogenous. Pour into collins glasses to 2/3 full. Top glasses with cola. Enjoy watching it set for about 30 seconds. Serve with a spoon.

name: Lambada
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Pour over crushed ice in a fancy glass.

name: Las Vegas
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, and serve, with straws.

name: Latin Love
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender until smooth consistency. Rim a hurricane glass with grenadine and coconut shavings, and pour in the mixture. Serve.

name: Lava Flow
instructions:
Blend banana, coconut cream, and pineapple juice in a blender and set aside. In the bottom of a hurricane glass, stir together both rums and strawberries.

Pour banana/coconut/pineapple mix slowly into the glass. The strawberry/rum mix should creep up the sides of the glass to make a wonderful looking (and tasting) summertime cocktail!

name: Lazy Daze
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add lemonade and float cream on top. Garnish with a cherry and mint sprig, and serve.

name: Leadville Hot Chocolate
instructions: Add everything to a coffee mug and fill to the top with hot half and half.

name: Leah's Last Hope
instructions: Add ice, mix and serve.

name: Leah's Last Hope #2
instructions: Add ice, mix, and serve.

name: LeFreak
instructions: Fill 1/2 highball glass with ice, and add both liquors. Fill glass with milk or half-and-half.

name: Lemon Tree
instructions: Blend briefly with a tablespoon of crushed ice in a highball glass. Add straws, and serve.

name: Lesbian Slumber Party
instructions: Fill blender with ice. Add ingredients and fill with milk. Blend, pour into chilled glass. Garnish with a marshmallow and serve.

name: Letitia's Penisbutter Cup
instructions: Combine all ingredients, pour over ice, and enjoy.

name: Lindsey's Night Cap
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a mug, and serve.

name: Liquid After-Eight
instructions: Pour the creme de menthe into a highball glass. Fill the glass with cold chocolate-milk.

name: Liquid Herpes
instructions: Pour the rum, goldschlager and milk into a highball glass. Stir ingredients. Pour tobasco sauce in after toasting and before drinking. Do not stir the tobasco sauce. Serve with whipped cream or marshmallows.

name: Liquid Leg Spreader
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Lisa's Rooted Beer Float
instructions: First chill the Beer Mugs in the freezer. Place 2 oz. root beer schnapps in glass then the 1 oz. vanilla schnapps. Tilt glass and slowly pour in about 8 oz. of vanilla coke. Slowly set it upright and place two tablespoons of Cool Whip. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Log Cabin
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except soda) with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with orange soda, and serve.

name: London Freeze
instructions: Shake ice cream and gin in a cocktail shaker until sufficiently mixed. Pour into a collins glass and add carbonated water. Stir well.

name: Long Tall Cowboy
instructions: Pour the schnapps, Bailey's and milk into a cocktail shaker over the ice. Shake, then strain into a long frosted glass, and serve.

name: Love in the Afternoon
instructions: Blend ingredients in a pina colada glass until smooth. Add half a glassful of crushed ice and blend again briefly. Garnish with a strawberry, add straws, and serve.

name: Luftschlange
instructions: Shake all ingredients. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Machiavelli Pina Colada
instructions: Combine all ingredients togehter in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and empty contents into a pina-colada glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Mad Russian
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add 1 shot each of vodka and Kahlua and 1/2 shot each of Baileys and butterscotch and fill with milk. Shake or stir.

name: Maiden Head
instructions: Mix chilled ingredients; cherry brandy, 7-up and snapple with a stirring stick. Top with whipped cream and a cherry in a white wine glass.

name: Maktak Special
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice; strain into a collins glass. Fill with ginger ale.

name: Malibu Creme
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir.

name: Malibu Mocha Milkshake
instructions: Add malibu rum and sugar to a hurricane glass. Fill to three-quarters full with milk, and whip to blend. Add creme de cacao, stir, and drop in 3 - 4 ice cubes.

name: Mallis 97
instructions: Shake ingredients in a glass with a few ice cubes.

name: Mama Mia #2
instructions: Heat up the coffee and coffee brandy. Add the vodka cold, and top the mug up with whipped cream.

name: Mansion Mind Eraser
instructions: Pour the kahlua, bailey's and rum over ice cubes in a collins glass, and fill with 7-up. Serve with two straws.

name: Martian Sex Monster
instructions: Blend the galliano, cognac, and ice cream briefly in a highball glass half-filled with crushed ice. Sprinkle the melon liqueur on top, and serve with straws.

name: McGuire's Fuzzy Irishman
instructions: Add to a highball glass with/without ice.

name: McShake
instructions: Combine in a blender - chocolate syrup to taste. Blend until desired thickness.

name: Mekong
instructions: Mix the first ten ingredients (malibu, peach, strawberry, banana, melon, blue, orange juice, pineapple juice, pina mix, 7-up) in a shaker. Pour into a hurricane glass, then top with cream. Serve with fresh fruit (except lime), and some filberts if desired.

name: Melon Colada
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a pina colada glass with a slice of pineapple, cherry and straws.

name: Metromelt
instructions: Mix hot chocolate to taste in a large mug. Add liquors, top with whipped cream, sprinkle with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Mexican Colada
instructions: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker, strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Midori Colada
instructions: Blend ingredients. Best served in a hurricane glass with a straw.

name: Midori Green Russian
instructions: Pour midori and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Top with cream, to taste.

name: Midori Splice
instructions: Build all ingredients over ice in a tall glass. Float fresh cream last.

name: Milk 'n' Cookies
instructions: Combine ingredients in a collins glass. Fill with milk.

name: Milk Punch
instructions: Shake liquors and milk with cracked ice and sugar syrup and strain into a chilled highball glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Milk Shake 43
instructions: Pour licor 43 over ice, shake and strain into a highball glass. Vary ingredients to taste.

name: Milky Nooky
instructions: Shake and serve in a highball glass.

name: Milpsi
instructions: Pour milk into a highball glass, add the pepsi and drink before seperation occurs.

name: Mint Chocolate Chip
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add all ingredients and fill to the top with cream.

name: Mint Chocolate Milk
instructions: Heat milk approx 1.5 minutes in microwave. Then mix all ingredients and serve.

name: Mint Vacation Treat
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender until smooth.

name: Mississippi Mud Pie
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a highball glass on the rocks.

name: Mistress
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Sprinkle with campari, and serve with a cherry.

name: MOB
instructions: Pour the Malibu, orange juice and Bailey's into a highball glass. Stir, add a few ice cubes, and serve.

name: Mocha Maria
instructions: Add ingredients to shaker half-filled with ice, shake, and pour over ice in a highball glass.

name: Mogul Masher
instructions: Mix hot chocolate as per usual (in a 12 oz. glass or larger) and add liquors. Top with whipped cream.

name: Monk's Butt
instructions: Pour frangelico, butterscotch schnapps, and creme de cacao over ice. Add milk (or cream) if desired, and stir.

name: Mont Blanc
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender for 20 seconds. Pour into a wine glass, and serve.

name: Moo Moo
instructions: Pour both liquors into glass with ice. Add cream and shake well. Serve with a large straw.

name: Morning Junkie Monkey
instructions: Add ingredients to a glass with ice. Shake and serve.

name: Morning Milk
instructions: Blend until smooth and creamy. Pour into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Mother Fucking Ape
instructions: Pour all ingredients except for brandy into a mug filled with ice cubes, and stir. Drizzle brandy on top and serve.

name: Mother Moo
instructions: Pour the licor 43 into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with milk, and add a stirring pin.

name: Mounds
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice, add rum, creme de cacao, and fill with cream.

name: Mozart Cola
instructions: Pour liquids into a hurricane glass, and add a scoop of ice cream on top. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings, add straws, and serve.

name: Mozart Milkshake
instructions: Shake or blend ingredients and pour into a tall glass. Sprinkle with grated chocolate, add a straw, and serve.

name: Mr G
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Multiple Orgasm
instructions: Build over ice in a tall glass. Garnish with strawberries or cherries.

name: Multiple Orgasm #2
instructions: Add ingredients to a blender with crushed ice and mix until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass, and top with a cherry. Tastes like a chocolate shake, but with a kick.

name: Mundo Fine
instructions: Shake or mix all ingredients, and pour over ice cubes into a collins glass, (or any glass large enough). Garnish with an orange slice, a lemon slice, and a cherry if so desired.

name: Neiler
instructions: Stir ingredients into glass with some crushed ice.

name: Neopolitan Dream
instructions: Pour cream and coconut milk into blender. Blend at high speed for 1 minute, until frothy. Add the Ice Cream (Neopolitan), milk and Kahlua, then blend for 2 - 3 minutes (you can add more Kahlua if you'd prefer). Put in freezer for 5 - 10 minutes to chill, since the blending heats it up, or drink immediately.

name: New Orleans Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except soda) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes, fill with soda, and serve.

name: Nichols' Flaming Cocktail
instructions: Pour the Kahlua, condensed milk, cream soda and rum into a cocktail shaker with cubed ice and shake. Strain into a hurricane glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry. If desired, layer Bacardi 151 on top and ignite. Enjoy fireshow, extinguish, and drink.

name: Nicky's Sweet Tooth
instructions: Stir ingredients together in a highball glass. Optional; add a small scoop of ice cream, chocolate fudge stirred and mixed, or a healthy dose of whipped cream on top.

name: Nightcap
instructions: Heat the milk. Add sugar and kahlua, sprinkle nutmeg on top, and serve.

name: Nightwalker
instructions: Put high-quality instant coffee into a blender, and dissolve it using a minimal amount of boiling water. Add whole milk and vanilla ice cream (with chocolate chips where possible). Blend it all together. Add Amarula and stir well. Pour into a hurricane glass and freeze it for about 15-20 minutes. Garnish with whipped cream on top.

name: Nubian Queen
instructions: Add ice to the mug and add JíƒÂ¤germeister and the dark rum. Fill with chocolate milk. Gently pour the caramel vodka into the drink.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Private Stock dark rum

name: Nuclear Waste #2
instructions: Shake well and serve in a highball glass.

name: Nutney
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Serve on ice.

name: Nuts Banane
instructions: Blend with half a glassful of crushed ice until smooth. Serve in a collins glass, and garnish with a banana slice and cherry.

name: Nutty Banana
instructions: Shake and strain over ice in a highball glass.

name: Nutty Russian
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka, amaretto and Frangelico. Fill with milk. Stir and serve.

name: Oatmeal Cookie and Hot Chocolate
instructions: Add liqueurs to a mug of hot chocolate. Stir, top with whipped cream and chocolate shavings. Enjoy!

name: Ogre Drink
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve in a beer mug.

name: Oki Sun
instructions: Blend ingredients in a bar blender until frothy. Serve.

name: One Ball Left
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the soda, and serve.

name: Orange Flamingo
instructions: Fill a highball glass four-fifths with orange soda. Add grenadine, and top with whipped cream.

name: Orange Swamp
instructions: Build over ice in a beer mug. Stir.

name: Orange Truffle Mocha
instructions: Fill a tall glass halfway with ice. Whisk together the ingredients (not the milk) and pour over the ice. Fill the glass the rest of the way with cold milk. Stir lightly and serve.

name: Orange Whip
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice cubes and stir.

name: Orchid
instructions: Pour all ingredients into glass over ice.

name: Oreo Speedwagon
instructions: Blend ingredients in blender until smooth.

name: Orgasm #3
instructions: Build over ice, garnish with a strawberry or maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Painting Pink
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

name: Paisano
instructions: Pour vodka and frangelico into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with milk, and shake.

name: Papagena
instructions: Mix well in a shaker with three or four ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Paradise Peaches and Cream
instructions: In blender combine 1 oz. Grenadine, 2 cups vanilla ice cream, 1/2 cup milk, 1 fresh ripe peach, and 4 oz. peach flavored vodka. Blend until smooth. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with peach wedge and cherry.

name: Paralyzer
instructions: Pour tequilla, vodka and kahlua over ice in a collins glass. Half-fill with coke, and top with light cream or milk. Stir gently with a straw, and serve.

name: Paralyzer #2
instructions: Build ingredients, in order, over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: Paris Paradise
instructions: Pour ingredients into a blender, mix together, and serve in a beer pilsner.

name: Pasquale's Rico Suave
instructions: Fill Hurricane glass with ice, add Bailey's, dark Creme de Cacao, Frangelico, Kahlua and Jameson Irish Whiskey. Top off with milk, shake and enjoy!

name: Passcack Valley Orgasm
instructions: Pour all ingredients into an iced shaker and shake well. Strain into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Passion
instructions: Blend the frozen grape juice and ice together in a blender. Add the rum and blend until smooth. Add whipped cream to desired smoothness. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Patria Colada
instructions: Add ingredients to blender with crushed ice. Blend, adding ice until desired consistency is reached. pour into a glass and garnish with tropical umbrellas and shredded coconut if available.

name: Peach Beseech
instructions: Shake everything with ice; strain into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Peach Blow Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Peaches and Cream
instructions: Pour kahlua and schnapps into a highball glass. Fill with milk, shake, and serve.

name: Peachumba
instructions: First the Schnapps, then at least 1 oz. of Vodka. Fill up with Chocolate milk.

name: Peanut Coffee Frenzy
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Add the 7-up, and serve.

name: Peppermint Aztec
instructions: Pour milk and liquors into a coffee mug, and add a peppermint stick or candy cane.

name: Peppermint Crisp
instructions: Blend the creme de menthe and kahlua together. Fill with ice cold milk, add a few ice cubes, and serve.

name: Phantasm
instructions: Shake everything except cola with ice; strain into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill the rest of the glass with cola and add a puff of whipped cream on top.

name: Phantom
instructions: Pour licor 43 into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add absolut vodka, fill with milk, and mix.

name: Pickled Tink
instructions:
1. At least 3 hours before serving, place small jar of candied cherries w/ juice, several slices of large cucumber into a small cooking pot with í‚Â½ cup of grenadine and 1 cup of water. Let simmer on lowest heat setting for 15 minutes.

2. Strain out the cucumber slices and chill on a plate in refrigerator.

3. Pour remaining fruit mixture into a blender and blend to a smooth consistency.

4. Pour mixture into buttered cupcake tin and place in the freezer until frozen. (Number of potential servings depends on number of í¢â‚¬Å“fruit cupsí¢â‚¬Â made) 

5. Combine;
í‚Â· 4 oz. - Baileyí¢â‚¬â„¢s Irish Cream
í‚Â· 2 oz. - Rumple Minze Peppermint Liqueur
í‚Â· 1 oz. - Goldschlager Cinnamon Schnapps
í‚Â· 1 oz. - Bacardi Limon Rum
í‚Â· 1 frozen í¢â‚¬Å“fruit cupí¢â‚¬Â of setup mixture
í‚Â· í‚Â½ cup of ice

Blend thoroughly and pour into a chilled tall (Tea) glass (about 12 ounces). Place a single cucumber slice at the top as a garnish & dust lightly with paprika.

name: Pina Colada
description: Old-style recipe for this popular drink. The coconut cream needs to have the right consistancy, some find the alternative, coconut milk to be too thin, however you can add condensed milk to coconut milk to bring up it's thickness. Add pineapple juice if desired.Put all ingredients into an electric blender with 2 cups of crushed ice. Blend at a high speed for a short length of time. Strain into a collins glass and serve with a straw.
instructions: Put all ingredients into an electric blender with 2 cups of crushed ice. Blend at a high speed for a short length of time. Strain into a collins glass and serve with a straw.

name: Pina Colada #2
instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with crushed ice. Mix well and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh pineapple, and serve.

name: Pineapple Francine
instructions: Blend everything with a cupful of ice until desired smoothness is reached. Add ice if necessary. Pour into glasses.

name: Pink Cream Fizz
instructions: Combine the gin, lemon juice, sugar, cream, and grenadine in a shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda, and stir well.

name: Pink Flamingo #2
instructions: Add crushed ice, vanilla schnapps, and grenadine to a hurricane glass. Add a few splashes of orange juice and fill with cream. Garnish with two maraschino cherries.

name: Pink Milk
instructions: Add all ingredients into a shaker/blender and mix until frothy.

name: Pink Panties
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Serve in a tall glass.

name: Pink Rose Fizz
instructions: Shake everything with ice (except for the soda). Strain into a highball glass, fill the glass with soda.

name: Pink Russian
instructions: Pour liquor into a highball glass with ice. Fill with milk or cream, and shake.

name: Pinky Colada
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Garnish with an amarelle cherry, and serve.

name: Pirate Float
instructions: Add all ingredients, in order, into a highball glass. Stir if desired.

name: Pirate Margarita
instructions: Build over ice in a collins glass.

name: Pisang Cold
instructions: Combine in a highball glass with two to three ice cubes, shake, and serve.

name: Pitbull On Crack
instructions: Fill a 16 oz. glass with ice and add the alcohol. Stir and top off with cream, and serve.

name: Plastered Possum
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker and pour into a hurricane glass.

name: Ponche De Creme
instructions: Lightly beat all ingredients except bitters. Add an amount of crushed ice such that it just absorbs the mixture. After filling glasses, add a dash of bitters to each glass.

name: Pond Scum
instructions: Pour into a highball glass. Float Irish cream on top, and serve.

name: Port Eggnog
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass and fill with milk. Garnish with nutmeg.

name: Port Milk Punch
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Port Wine Eggnog
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

name: Potent Possum
instructions: Put all ingredients into a bar blender except the banana liqueur. Blend the drink until it is thick and slushy. Pour into a highball glass, and then put the shot of banana liqueur over the top. If you want to spruce up the appearance, spray a little whipped cream over the top of the banana liqueur.

name: Pure Ecstacy
instructions: Pour bailey's and kahlua into a blender until, at most, one-third full. Add enough ice to fill the blender. Blend on a low speed, continually adding ice until a milkshake-consistancy. Mix in the vodka. Strain into wine glasses, and serve.

name: Purple Fairy Dream
instructions: Pour in vodka, cranberry juice and mix. Add the raspberry liqueur, blue curacao and cream of coconut, and mix again. Fill with 7-up.

name: Purple Love
instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, for about 25 seconds, and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with chocolate flakes.

name: Purple Orchid
instructions: Put everything into the blender. Blend until smooth. Pour and enjoy!

name: Pushkin's Milkshake
instructions: Mix vodkas, cocoa and cold milk in a shaker or blender and pour into a chilled, stemmed glass. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Queen Soda
instructions: Stir and serve in a highball glass with three or four ice cubes.

name: Raspberry Beret #2
instructions: Blend all the ingredients with 8 ice cubes (like a mudslide). Pour in a glass rimmed with red-coloured sugar, top with whipped cream and sprinkle with red colored sugar.

name: Raspberry Cheesecake
instructions: Blend ingredients until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass, and serve.

name: Raspberry Colada
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry, add straws, and serve.

name: Raspberry Romance
instructions: Build in a parfait glass and fill with club soda.

name: Ratty Ol'Deer Head
instructions: Serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Razzbaretto
instructions: Mix in a blender and serve in a hurricane glass or a snifter. Garnish with a swirl of whipped cream.

name: Road Runner
instructions: Blend with 1/2 cup of ice for 15 seconds and pour into a champagne flute with a nutmeg/sugar mixture. Garnish with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Roasted Toasted Almond
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Roffsing
instructions: Pour passoa, vodka, lime juice and pear soda into a collins glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir, top with cream, and serve.

name: Root Beer Float
instructions: Pour vodka, galliano, and light cream into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and stir well. Fill with cola, stir lightly, top with whipped cream, and serve.

name: Rum Coke Float
instructions: Place two scoops of rum flavored ice-cream into a hurricane glass, add rum and fill with coke. Garnish with a cherry and serve with a straw.

name: Rum Flip
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass and fill with milk. Garnish with nutmeg.

name: Rum Milk Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Rum Sunday
instructions: Blend briefly all ingredient (except overproof rum) with half a glassful of crushed ice. Pour into a collins glass, float overproof rum on top, and sprinkle with grated chocolate.

name: Russian Banana
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Russian Qualude
instructions: Pour liquors over ice in a highball glass. Top with cream or milk, stir, and serve.

name: Saoco
instructions: Pour over crushed ice in a collins glass, stir, and serve.

name: Saskatchewan Paralyzer
instructions:
Fill a chilled highball glass with ice. Pour in Kahlua and vodka. Pour in cola next. Very important otherwise the milk will curdle. Top with cold milk and a cherry for the ladies. Add a straw. The drink should be served unstirred. 

You can just use 1-oz vodka if you don't have Kahlua. You can also substute the vodka with tequila.

name: Satin Angel
instructions: Add a splash of Coca-Cola to the Frangelico over Ice, and fill add the cream.

name: Scorpino
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender, pour into a highball glass, and serve.

name: Scottie Mac
instructions: Chill rum. Then layer. Creme de Banana first, then Bailey's and float rum on top.

name: Screaming Multiple Climax
instructions: Best if built in a mixing glass with ice, shaken and poured into Hurricane glass, but can be built directly in the Hurricane glass.

name: Screaming Multiple Orgasm
instructions: Build over ice. Garnish with strawberries or cherries, and serve.

name: Sex On The Beach #6
instructions: Highball glass 1/2 full ice. Add vodka and schnapps. Fill to near top with OJ, amount depends on ice and glass size. Add cream last and stir. May be served up after mixing. The amount of OJ and dairy cream may be adjusted to taste.

name: Sexy Blue Eyed Boy
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender with 2 ice cubes, and blend until smooth. Pour into a tall glass, and serve.

name: Sherry Milk Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Slider
instructions: Add Rye, kahlua and milk to a high ball glass, glass should be full of ice. Stir and enjoy.

name: Slippery Eggs
instructions: Stir ingredients well so that the drink is the original color of the eggnog.

name: Smith and Kearns
instructions: Build in an iced highball glass. Top with soda, and serve.

name: Smith and Wesson
instructions: Pour vodka, kahlua, and cream into glass filled with ice, then top off with Pepsi.

name: Snake Piss
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add ingredients and stir occasionally.

name: Snowplow
instructions: Mix hot chocolate to taste, add booze, top with whipped cream and sprinkle with cinnamon.

name: Splender Blenders
instructions: Add all ingredients in blender, blend till slushy, add sugar to taste.

name: Starla's Waver
instructions: Get a large glass, (any glass but it must be large) Start from the top of the list and work your way down stirring each time you add an ingredient. Serve.

name: Storm Trooper
instructions: Mix ingredients together.

name: Strawberry and Coffee Cream Soda
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except soda) with half a glassful of crushed ice. Add the soda, and garnish with a slice of banana between two halves of a strawberry. Add straws, and serve.

name: Strawberry Cascade
