instructions: Blend all but the kahlua briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Sprinkle the kahlua on top, and garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry half. Add straws, and serve.

name: Strawberry Colada
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry, add straws, and serve.

name: Strawberry Cream
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry half, add straws, and serve.

name: Strawberry Fetish
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemonade and soda) and strain into a collins glass filled with broken ice. Add lemonade and soda, garnish with a strawberry, and serve.

name: Strawberry Knockout
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except whipped cream) briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Top with whipped cream, garnish with a strawberry, add straws and serve.

name: Strawberry Tropicolada
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour into a pina colada glass and serve.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Swimming Pool
instructions: Mix ingredients well, pour into an exotic glass and float the blue curacao on top.

name: Tanyahtoo
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.

name: Teresa's Dream Shake
instructions: In shaker mix Kahlua, Tequila Rose, ice and milk. Shake and pour into frosted beer mug.

name: Texas Sling
instructions: Blend with ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, topped with whipped cream.

name: The Dangerous Dave
instructions: Combine Tequila, Cream of Coconut and Pineapple Juice in a blender. A quick blast to blend ingredients. Fill blender to top with ice. Blend on high speed until it's like a slurpy. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with pineapple wedge.

name: The Gold, The Bad, and The Ugly
instructions: Pour the kahlua and bailey's irish cream into a glass. Fill most of the glass with milk, leaving enough room for the goldschlager. Float the goldschlager using the back of a spoon.

name: The Italian Job
instructions: Whisk with a fork, until all mixed in. Add cream after mixing.

name: The Whole Maryann
instructions: Layer over ice and serve.

name: The World's Best Pina Colada
instructions: Combine rum, cream of coconut and pineapple juice in a regular sized blender. Blend on low speed, and fill with ice. Blend on high speed until ice is grainy. Pour into a hurricane glass, garnish with a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Tidbit
instructions: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

name: Titia's Tushie
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a hurricane glass, and shake.

name: Toasted Almond
instructions: Shake, strain into highball glass.

name: Toblerone
instructions: Blend with ice and serve in a tall glass. Garnish with chocolate flakes and optionally chocolate topping drizzled down the inside of the glass.

name: Torombolo
instructions: Pour chocolate milk into a large glass, and add the licor 43. Mix well, and serve cold.

name: Tropical Clarkson
instructions: Prepare the hot chocolate and add the Kahlua. Top with whipped cream or marshmallows.

name: Tropicetto
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and pour into a hurricane glass.

name: Tropicolada
instructions: Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice in a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry, add straws, and serve.

name: Tuaca Nutter
instructions: Mix in cocktail shaker with ice. Serve on the rocks. Garnish with chocolate shavings & chopped roast nuts.

name: Turlock Bulldog
instructions: Mix Kahlua and Bailey's in glass. Fill with rootbeer.

name: Umbrella Man Special
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Serve with straw and ice cubes, put a cocktail umbrella beside the straw in the glass.

name: Vanilla Creamsicle
instructions: Pour liquors into a hurricane glass. Add cold milk, stir, and serve immediately.

name: Velvet Hammer #2
instructions: Pour creme de cacao, vodka and cream into a blender. Add ice, half a sliced banana, and sugar to taste. Blend until smooth and pureed, and pour into a glass. Serve.

name: Velvet Presley
instructions: Pour bourbon over ice, add chocolate milk until creamy, and serve.

name: Vit Ryss
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass, add ice, and mix.

name: Vodka Pina Colada
instructions: Add ingredients to a shaker and swirl until sugar is dissolved. Sweeten further if needed. Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice, and strain into a pina colada glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry, add straws, and serve.

name: Waikiki Beach
instructions: Rim a wine goblet with egg white and sweet grated coconut. Shake ingredients, strain into the glass, and serve.

name: Whiskey Milk Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Whiskey Plush
instructions: Shake all ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled wine glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg, and serve.

name: White Ape
instructions: Make hot chocolate, add bailey's and ground cinnamon. Float whipped cream on top.

name: White Bat
instructions: Build all ingredients in a tall glass over ice. Stir, add a straw, and serve.

name: White Bull
instructions: Pour ice into a glass, add tequila and kahlua, fill with cream, shake and serve.

name: White Carnation
instructions: Stir and pour over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: White Cloud
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

name: White Elephant
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender, and mix until smooth and thick. Serve with a straw, and a garnish of shredded coconut.

name: White Jamaican
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice and pour in the ingredients. Speed shake and serve.

name: White Rabbit
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, add in the vodka, vanilla liqueur, and milk. Shake and serve.

name: White Ukrainian
description: "Many things Russian are actually a slightly watered down version of something cooler in Ukrainian (anyone who tells you differently is buying into years of communist propoganda).  So clearly a White Russian is just a watered down version of the real drink which has been kept hidden behind the iron curtain for far too long.". Thanks to Anna Lawrence.Pour all alcohol directly into glass (over ice, if preferred).  Add milk.  Stir.  Serve.
instructions: Pour all alcohol directly into glass (over ice, if preferred).  Add milk.  Stir.  Serve.

name: Will to Live
instructions: Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry, add straws, and serve.

name: Windy Beach
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Makes 2 servings.

name: Winter Breeze
instructions: Pour liquors into a beer mug, and fill with milk. Stir, and serve.

name: Wolfsbane
instructions: Rub the inside of a highball glass with lemon juice, and sprinkle with sugar. Frost in a freezer. Shake ingredients, pour into the frosted glass, and serve.

name: Wooly Mitten
instructions: Place cocoa powder into a mug, half-fill with hot water, and stir. Pour in the southern comfort, peppermint schnapps, and bailey's. Stir, add more hot water, and top with whipped cream.

name: Yuppidoo
instructions: Shake all on ice and strain into a highball glass.

name: Zico
instructions: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Serve.
